GameConsole.View

Class WindowMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameConsole.View.WindowMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.util.Observer

    public class WindowMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.Observer
    This class is to display the interface of the game where the player can visually perform game operations.
